Role matrix

Matrix

top menu
'AI' - 'ADMIN', 'DATA', 'MANAGER'
all sub-menu - the same roles

'Batch' = 'ADMIN', 'DATA', 'MANAGER', 'OPERATOR'
all sub-menu - the same roles

'Control panel' - 'MASTER_ASSET_MANAGER', 'MASTER_ADMIN', 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT', 'ADMIN', 'DATA', 'MANAGER'
sub-menu:
    'Source codes' - 'MASTER_ASSET_MANAGER', 'ADMIN', 'DATA', 'MANAGER'
    'Variables' - 'ADMIN', 'DATA'
    'Functions' - 'MASTER_ASSET_MANAGER', 'ADMIN', 'DATA'
    'Processors' - 'ADMIN', 'DATA'
    'Accounts' - 'ADMIN'

    'Company'
        on 'Companies' page:
        edit - 'MASTER_ADMIN'
        button 'Accounts' - 'MASTER_ADMIN'
    'Company'->'Accounts' - 'MASTER_ADMIN'


    'Company'->'Batches' - 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT'
        on 'Batches' page:
        view index page - 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT'
        status - 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT'
        download original file - 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT'
        download result file - 'MASTER_OPERATOR', 'MASTER_SUPPORT'

        group deletion of batches - 'MASTER_OPERATOR'
        delete concrete batch - 'MASTER_OPERATOR'
        upload files and start processing - 'MASTER_OPERATOR'
